alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN MORA COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wagon Mound, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 381 and 396. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands
